featured.text: I love them.” 17 this, Aesop answered, “I’m happy to tell you, my dear friend, that you’ll find the people of Athens much the same.”
Aesop replied, “Tell me where you come from and what sort of people live there, and I’ll tell you what sort of people you’ll find in Athens.”
Over the recent years, it has faced growing pressure to hand back the Elgin Marbles, sculptures taken from the Parthenon in Athens, Greece, in the 19th century.
“Well, I’m afraid you’ll find the people of Athens much the same,” replied Aesop.
Ancient Athens, famous for its early development of the democratic system, is often said to be the _____ of democracy.

definition.zh_def: 雅典：希臘的首都，以其古代文化和歷史著稱。
definition.en_def: Athens: The capital city of Greece, known for its ancient culture and history.
definition.example: Athens is famous for its historical landmarks like the Acropolis.
